Package edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hg

Class FormulaNode

java.lang.Object
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hg.Node
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hg.FormulaNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
CostSet, Countable, Serializable, Iterable<CostSet.Entry>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArithmeticNode, ConstantNode, FluentNode, UtilityNode
public abstract class FormulaNode extends Node implements CostSet
An cost set node whose logical formula appears as a smaller part of some larger formula and which needs to notify the node representing that larger formula when its gains new values.
Author:
Stephen G. Ware
